items.name: Snowglobe Selfie
items.prompt: A hyper-realistic, festive holiday portrait featuring the individual from the provided reference image, seamlessly integrated inside an ornate glass snowglobe. The snowglobe sits on a polished wooden base engraved with subtle holiday motifs. Soft, weightless snow drifts through the air, illuminated by warm coral-gold Christmas lights that create a radiant, cozy glow. Painterly reflections curve across the glass surface, emphasizing depth, curvature, and atmospheric realism. Surround the subject with delicate bokeh lights, gentle rim-lighting, and subtle refractions that enhance facial structure while preserving likeness. Style the composition with premium, cinematic detail, luminous highlights, and a magical winter ambience reminiscent of high-end holiday illustration and luxury advertising photography. Ultra-sharp focus on the face, impeccable skin texture, and rich color grading in coral, gold, and soft winter whites.

items.name: Holiday Sitcom Poster
items.prompt: A high-impact holiday sitcom movie poster featuring the individual from the reference image as the confident, charismatic lead. Surround them with an ensemble of cheerful friends in boldly patterned ugly Christmas sweaters, each character framed with expressive, comedic poses that hint at playful interpersonal dynamics. Place a brilliantly lit Christmas tree in the background, layered with warm, painterly illumination, soft bokeh glow, and rich festive color grading. Use cinematic poster composition: bold central hero placement, balanced supporting cast, dynamic diagonals, and premium typography space. Emphasize vibrant comedic energy, cozy holiday warmth, and polished studio-grade detail. Ultra-sharp facial fidelity, crisp edges, and refined lighting that evokes a classic, feel-good holiday sitcom advertisement.

items.name: New Year Countdown Confetti
items.prompt: A cinematic, ultra-detailed New Year's Eve portrait of the person from the reference image at the exact stroke of midnight, preserving their facial likeness with crisp, hyperreal skin texture and expressive eyes. They are framed waist-up in shallow depth of field, surrounded by a storm of colorful confetti, glowing city billboards, and blurred fireworks exploding in the distance. Champagne bubbles and mist shimmer in the air with subtle motion blur, while rich cobalt, magenta, and molten gold hues wrap the scene in an electric countdown atmosphere. Dramatic backlight and rim light carve out the silhouette, creating a radiant, celebratory sparkle that feels like a high-end New Year campaign visual.

items.name: North Pole Fashion Week
items.prompt: A surreal, luxurious North Pole Fashion Week runway tableau rendered in ultra-refined, painterly detail. Elegant couture elves and majestic reindeer stride down a shimmering ice runway, each styled in avant-garde winter fashion featuring crystalline embroidery, sculptural silhouettes, and iridescent fabrics that refract polar light. The person from the reference image appears as the headlining designer or model, their likeness preserved with cinematic realism and flattering editorial lighting. The runway glows with intricate ice carvings, frosted reflections, and sparkling snow mist drifting through the air. Towering translucent ice arches, soft aurora hues, and subtle lens flares create a dreamlike, high-fashion atmosphere worthy of a global winter collection reveal.

items.name: Gift Wrap Gone Wrong
items.prompt: A humorous, story-rich holiday scene of the person from the reference image tangled in layers of colorful wrapping paper, curling ribbons, and scattered tape while preserving their facial likeness and expression. They sit in the middle of a cozy living room floor, surrounded by playful pets nosing into gift boxes, half-wrapped presents, open scissors, and torn packaging snowed across a plush rug. Warm home lighting from a nearby Christmas tree and soft table lamps wraps the scene in golden glow, with twinkling bokeh lights and subtle painterly texture. The composition captures festive chaos, laughter, and relatable holiday clumsiness with cinematic framing and clean, faceswap-friendly detail.

items.name: World-Class Model Look
items.prompt: A striking, high-fashion portrait of the person from the reference image transformed into a world-class runway model, preserving their bone structure and identity with hyperreal precision. They pose with effortless confidence in an elegant couture outfit, tailored to perfection with luxurious fabrics, crisp seams, and subtle metallic accents. Soft, directional studio lighting sculpts cheekbones and jawline, creating refined shadows and a luminous skin glow. The background falls into cinematic blur with gradient tones of coral and cobalt, delicate lens flares, and painterly bokeh. Overall, the image feels like a glossy magazine cover beauty shot, polished yet natural, optimized for faceswap clarity and detail.

items.name: Toy Box Edition
items.prompt: A hyperrealistic, collectible toy-box portrait of the person from the reference image reimagined as an articulated vinyl figure, while preserving their recognizable facial features in stylized proportions. The figure stands inside a clear plastic display box with glossy reflections, custom branding, logo stickers, and playful label typography printed on the cardboard backing. Bright studio lighting creates crisp highlights on the toy's painted surfaces, sculpted hair, and miniature outfit details. The packaging is shown front-on with painterly realism, soft shadows on the surface beneath, and a vibrant pop-art color palette that feels like a premium, limited-edition figure straight from a designer toy store.

items.name: Wild West Sheriff
items.prompt: A cinematic, sun-drenched portrait of the person from the reference image transformed into a rugged Wild West sheriff, preserving their facial likeness beneath a weathered wide-brim hat. They stand in front of a dusty frontier town saloon with swinging doors, wooden facades, and distant mountains on the horizon. Golden-hour sunlight cuts through drifting dust and smoke, casting long dramatic shadows across the ground and over a worn leather duster coat, star-shaped badge, and holstered revolver. Painterly Western textures, warm ochre and burnt sienna tones, and subtle film-grain atmosphere evoke a classic Western movie poster while keeping the face sharp, detailed, and expressive.

items.name: Commander-in-Chief
items.prompt: A stately, cinematic presidential-style portrait of the person from the reference image seated at an ornate wooden desk in a grand office, preserving their facial identity with dignified realism. Soft window light pours in from one side, illuminating the face and hands while leaving the far side of the room in deeper, atmospheric shadow. National flags, heavy curtains, and framed documents form a tasteful backdrop, with subtle depth of field separating subject from environment. The subject wears formal attire and exudes calm authority, confidence, and composure. Painterly lighting, muted coral and navy tones, and fine textural detail give the scene the gravitas of a classic state portrait while remaining modern and cinematic.

items.name: Galactic Explorer
items.prompt: A cinematic sci-fi portrait of the person from the reference image as a galactic explorer standing on the rocky surface of an alien planet, preserving their likeness inside a reflective space helmet. The visor captures a swirling distant galaxy, multiple moons, and glowing nebulae reflected across the curved glass. Strange bioluminescent plants and crystalline formations rise from the ground, casting cobalt and violet light onto a sleek spacesuit with intricate mechanical details. Painterly sci-fi lighting, subtle lens flares, floating dust motes, and a deep starfield sky convey immense cosmic scale, mystery, and adventure, with the face rendered sharply and clearly for optimal faceswap results.

items.name: Mythic Hero Reborn
items.prompt: A powerful, epic fantasy portrait of the person from the reference image reimagined as a mythic warrior reborn, preserving their facial identity with heroic intensity. They wear ornate rune-etched armor that glows faintly with turquoise energy, layered over weathered metal plates and embossed leather. A stormy sky churns behind them, with distant lightning forks and swirling clouds framing their silhouette. Golden highlights from a low sun rim the armor edges and hair, while cool magical light radiates from a weapon or sigil they hold. Painterly epic realism, dynamic lighting contrast, drifting embers, and swirling cloak motion combine to convey timeless heroism and divine strength.

items.name: Pop Star Spotlight
items.prompt: A dynamic concert portrait of the person from the reference image as a global pop star mid-performance, preserving their likeness with crisp, expressive detail. They stand on a large stage, microphone in hand, surrounded by beams of colored spotlights, LED screens, and a glowing crowd of silhouettes holding phones in the background. Dramatic front and rim lighting carve out the figure, casting vivid coral, violet, and electric blue highlights across hair, outfit, and skin. Confetti and light haze catch the stage lights, creating painterly bokeh and sense of motion. The overall mood is high-energy, glamorous, and cinematic, like a hero frame from a big-budget concert film.

items.name: Comic Book Hero
items.prompt: A bold comic-book-style transformation of the person from the reference image into a larger-than-life superhero, preserving their facial features while stylizing them with clean inked outlines and cell-shaded color. They strike a dramatic power pose in the foreground, cape or energy trails whipping behind, with a dynamic city skyline or abstract action lines filling the background. Glowing eyes or hands suggest superpowers, while speed lines, halftone dots, and graphic motion streaks reinforce the vintage comic aesthetic. Painterly yet stylized shading, punchy primary colors, and a slightly textured print look make the image feel like a cover from a classic superhero issue.

items.name: Medieval Royalty
items.prompt: A regal, museum-quality portrait of the person from the reference image reimagined as medieval royalty, preserving their facial identity with refined, painterly realism. They sit on an ornate carved wooden throne in a candlelit great hall, wearing an intricate crown, embroidered velvet robes, and detailed jewelry that catches the warm glow of torchlight. Banners and stone arches fade softly into the background under shallow depth of field. Rich gold, crimson, and deep green tones dominate the color palette, with subtle texture reminiscent of oil paint on canvas. The overall composition evokes a historical royal portrait: dignified, powerful, and timeless.

items.name: Animated Movie Character
items.prompt: A stylized 3D animated portrait of the person from the reference image, preserving their core facial features while translating them into a charming feature-film character. Large expressive eyes, softened facial planes, and smooth, subtly glossy skin create a friendly, approachable look. Rendered in the style of a modern big-budget animated movie, with clean soft lighting, gently blurred background, and a warm, inviting color palette. Painterly yet polished materials, carefully defined hair strands, and fine specular highlights give the character cinematic depth and appeal, as if captured in a keyframe from an animated blockbuster.

items.name: Witchify Yourself
items.prompt: A cinematic fantasy portrait of the person from the reference image reimagined as a stylish modern witch, preserving their bone structure and expression with crisp, hyperreal detail. They wear a tailored velvet coat with ornate embroidery and a wide-brim hat casting a dramatic shadow across the eyes. A glowing spellbook in their hands throws warm amber light up onto cheekbones and lips, while orbiting candles and swirling lavender mist wrap around the figure. Floating sigils and shimmering particles drift through a night-sky backdrop, with a rich orange and cobalt color palette, painterly polish, and faceswap-friendly clarity.

items.name: Zombie Prom Night
items.prompt: A glam-horror portrait of the person from the reference image transformed into charismatic undead prom royalty, preserving their facial likeness beneath artful decay makeup and eerie glowing eyes. They stand beneath a glittering disco ball on a foggy gymnasium dance floor, wearing a torn tuxedo or sequin gown that still catches shards of colored light. Subtle exposed bone hints, smeared lipstick, and cracked skin textures remain stylish rather than grotesque. Neon reflections ripple across the floor, swirling fog curls around their feet, and the scene is lit with cinematic magenta, teal, and sickly green accents for painterly Halloween glam.

items.name: Pumpkin Throne Portrait
items.prompt: A regal, surreal portrait of the person from the reference image fused with a carved jack-o'-lantern visage, preserving their recognizable facial structure inside warm, glowing pumpkin skin. Intricate carved lines follow their natural features, with candlelight radiating from within and illuminating eyes, nose, and mouth. They wear an elaborate embroidered cape and royal costume, seated on a baroque throne in a grand hall lit like an old master oil painting. Flickering candelabras, drifting ember dust, and a coral-and-antique-gold palette create painterly fantasy grandeur and haunting seasonal elegance.

items.name: Monster Movie Poster: You're the Star
items.prompt: A retro 1980s monster movie poster featuring the person from the reference image as the fearless lead, preserving their likeness with dramatic chiaroscuro and bold cinematic lighting. They stand in the foreground, gripping a makeshift weapon or flashlight, while massive clawed silhouettes and monstrous eyes loom behind them. Distressed, hand-painted typography splashes the film title across the top, with tagline text and credit blocks layered at the bottom. Lightning strikes provide sharp rim light, fog and smoke swirl through the scene, and grainy film texture with saturated complementary colors completes the vintage VHS horror aesthetic.

items.name: Night of the Living Selfie
items.prompt: A retro 80s horror poster starring the person from the reference image as the flashlight-wielding hero, preserving their facial likeness under dramatic underlighting from a phone or torch. They stand in a foggy graveyard, tombstones and twisted trees rising behind them under a crescent moon. Neon, hand-drawn title typography arches across the top, with torn paper edges, film scratches, and grainy texture evoking worn theatrical posters. Painterly coral and cobalt highlights, lurid green glow from distant eyes in the mist, and bold composition create a nostalgic yet striking cult-horror cover.

items.name: The Pumpkin Conspiracy
items.prompt: A noir Halloween detective poster featuring the person from the reference image as a trench-coat detective, preserving their facial structure beneath the brim of a fedora. They stand in a rain-slick alley, lit by a lone streetlamp cutting through fog. Glowing pumpkins etched with cryptic symbols float or hover around them like evidence, casting shifting orange light onto their face and coat. Sharp diagonal shadows, cigarette smoke trails, and painterly orange-and-obsidian tones set the mood. Stylized, suspenseful typography and subtle film grain complete the moody Halloween noir aesthetic.

items.name: Ghosts Don't Text Back
items.prompt: A modern horror-comedy poster centered on the person from the reference image, their face lit dramatically by the glow of a smartphone screen, preserving their likeness with expressive detail. Teal and magenta rim lights trace the edges of their hair and shoulders, while holographic ghost emojis and glitchy chat bubbles stream from the phone and twist into the rainy city alley behind them. Neon signs blur into painterly streaks, puddles reflect distorted ghostly icons, and bold sans-serif title text anchors the composition. The overall tone mixes eerie supernatural tension with playful, smartphone-era satire.

items.name: Spellbound: A Love Story
items.prompt: A romantic fantasy poster starring the person from the reference image as an enchanting witch, preserving their soft expression and facial identity with cinematic clarity. They stand in a moonlit clearing, heart-shaped sparks and floating fireflies swirling around intertwined hands or a glowing charm. A luminous full moon forms a halo behind their head, casting gentle backlight on flowing hair and robes. Warm blush, rose-gold, and soft gold tones blend with deep midnight blues in painterly gradients. Handwritten script title typography, soft lens flare, and delicate magical particles create a dreamy, spellbound atmosphere.

items.name: Lantern Lake Reverie
items.prompt: A serene dreamscape of a glassy mountain lake at blue hour, the water perfectly mirroring a sky of deep indigo and faint stars. Thousands of floating lanterns drift across the surface, each casting a small halo of coral and gold light that overlaps into soft painterly reflections. Gentle fog hugs the silhouettes of pine trees along the shore, while distant peaks fade into atmospheric haze. The composition feels calm and meditative, with delicate brushstroke texture, subtle glow around each lantern, and an ethereal, almost silent ambience.

items.name: Sleeping Giant Meadow
items.prompt: A playful dreamscape featuring a colossal gentle giant napping in a sunlit meadow of oversized wildflowers. The giant lies on their side, breathing softly, while tiny forest creatures build lantern-lit homes on their shoulder, arms, and hair. Bees the size of birds drift between blossoms, and fireflies hover like floating stars. Golden-hour light pours across rolling grass, casting long, soft shadows and warm highlights. Painterly pastel hues and whimsical details give the scene a cozy, storybook fantasy feeling.

items.name: Midnight Balloon Voyage
items.prompt: A midnight adventure scene starring a glowing glass hot air balloon gliding above a surreal old-world cityscape of curved rooftops and spires. Inside the translucent balloon, tiny constellations twinkle, with swirling galaxies and star clusters embedded in the glass. Long-exposure light trails arc through the sky, following the balloon's path. Deep indigo atmosphere wraps the city, while warm lanterns in windows and streets create pockets of orange and gold contrast. Painterly brushstroke motion and gentle blur convey dreamlike movement and quiet wonder.

items.name: The Marionette's Revenge
items.prompt: A haunted marionette stage tableau, showing a wooden puppet poised mid-act as it saws through its own strings with tiny scissors. The puppet hangs in front of rich crimson theater curtains, their folds catching flickers of guttering candlelight from footlights below. Dust motes drift through the air, illuminated in sharp beams, while shadowy audience silhouettes barely reveal watching faces. The scene is rendered with cinematic tension, intricate wood grain and chipped paint on the puppet, and painterly lighting that hints at movement and rebellion.

items.name: Playroom After Midnight
items.prompt: A dim, moonlit children's playroom caught at the exact moment toys begin to move on their own. Pastel walls and storybook wallpaper frame the scene, but the mood is eerie: vintage dolls and wind-up toys climb shelves and stare toward the viewer with glassy eyes. An overturned block tower casts long angular shadows across the floor, and a small night-light glows softly, mixing with cold blue window light. Painterly texture, subtle motion blur on a rocking horse, and scattered dust in the air create an unsettling, cinematic atmosphere.

items.name: Teddy's Secret Smile
items.prompt: A deceptively cute yet unsettling portrait of a plush teddy bear sitting in the center of a darkened nursery. Its seams are slightly splitting to reveal a too-wide grin of hidden teeth, just visible in the glow of a circle of flickering jack-o'-lanterns around it. Faded nursery wallpaper peels in the background, toys lie toppled on the floor, and shadows stretch unnaturally across the room. Painterly lighting balances warm pumpkin orange with deep, velvety shadows, blending sweetness and horror in a single frame.

items.name: Nebula Lollipop Factory
items.prompt: A zero-gravity candy factory floating deep in space, rendered with vivid, surreal sci-fi detail. Robotic arms swirl molten sugar into miniature planets and spiral galaxies, each lollipop glowing with iridescent coral, magenta, and electric blue nebula patterns. Vapor clouds drift between suspended conveyor belts, catching scattered starlight from vast windows that look out onto a cosmic panorama. Chrome machinery reflects swirling color, and painterly brushwork merges industrial design with dreamy confectionery surrealism.

items.name: Astral Cotton Candy Parade
items.prompt: A whimsical cosmic parade marching through open space, featuring stardust beings twirling enormous cotton candy clouds that trail glowing comet tails. Floating parade floats shaped like crescent moons, planets, and candy comets drift along, festooned with fairy lights and banners made of aurora. Neon ribbons of light curl through the starfield, while distant galaxies form the backdrop. The mood is joyful and surreal, with painterly color motion, soft-edged forms, and a carnival-like sense of celebration in zero gravity.

items.name: Starlight Gumball Machine
items.prompt: A vintage chrome gumball machine standing at the center of a dark observatory, its glass globe filled not with candy but with miniature spinning galaxies, glowing star clusters, and tiny orbiting planets. Each cosmic gumball emits soft coral, cobalt, and violet light that refracts through the curved glass and scatters across the polished metal base. The reflective floor beneath catches fragmented constellations, while telescopes and star charts fade into shadow in the background. Painterly surreal detail, subtle lens glow, and deep space ambience create the feeling of a tiny universe for sale in a single magical machine.

items.name: You from Another Dimension
items.prompt: A cinematic portrait of the person from the reference image reimagined as their alternate-universe self, preserving core facial features while subtly shifting proportions, styling, and energy. One side of the face is lit with warm, natural tones, the other with cool, futuristic light, divided by a sharp split-light line that symbolizes crossing realities. Asymmetrical, luminous armor plates and holographic glyphs wrap around shoulders and chest, with faint reflections of another city or universe visible in the metallic surfaces. Painterly surreal symmetry, floating particles, and soft dimensional distortions convey the sense of standing between two worlds while keeping the likeness clear for faceswap.

items.name: Victorian You
items.prompt: A Victorian-era oil portrait faithfully depicting the person from the reference image, preserving their facial likeness with refined, painterly realism. They sit three-quarter view in an antique salon chair, dressed in period-accurate attire: intricate lace high collar, richly textured fabrics, and a polished cameo brooch at the throat. Soft directional studio lighting and candle glow sculpt gentle shadows across the face, emphasizing bone structure and subtle skin texture. The background features a muted parlor interior with heavy drapery and hints of gilded frame edges. Warm sepia and deep burgundy tones, fine brush strokes, and delicate crackle-paint patina give the impression of a museum-quality 19th-century portrait.

items.name: Cyberpunk You
items.prompt: A neon-soaked cyberpunk portrait of the person from the reference image placed in a rain-slick futuristic alley, preserving their facial features while augmenting them with luminous circuit tattoos and subtle cybernetic enhancements. Holographic signage in kanji and abstract symbols reflects across cheekbones and chrome jacket collar, while magenta and teal rim lights carve out a bold silhouette. Glitches, light streaks from passing hover-vehicles, and distant high-rise holograms fade into a hazy, painterly backdrop. The overall mood is atmospheric, futuristic, and cinematic, with crisp, faceswap-ready facial detail against a richly textured sci-fi cityscape.

items.name: Tiny Titans on a Teacup
items.prompt: A whimsical tabletop battle scene where miniature gods and titans clash atop a delicate porcelain teacup floating midair above a saucer. The teacup tilts slightly, with swirling tea forming stormy whirlpools and tiny lightning arcs. Armored tiny figures wield glowing coral and cobalt weapons, their magical blasts splashing against the rim like colored ink. Steam trails rise and coil into storm clouds overhead, partially obscuring gigantic everyday objects in the blurry background. Painterly tilt-shift focus, exaggerated sense of scale, and rich fantasy detail highlight the absurdity and drama of an epic battle on something so fragile.

items.name: Forest Sprite Bazaar
items.prompt: A bustling miniature forest marketplace hidden beneath towering luminous mushrooms, rendered with intricate, painterly fantasy detail. Tiny sprites with translucent wings trade jars of glowing fruit, bottled starlight, and thimble-sized pastries along twisting root-formed stalls. Dew drops hang like lanterns from spiderweb strings, casting soft prismatic light onto mossy pathways. Background foliage falls into soft blur, while carefully placed fireflies add additional warm points of light. The overall tone is playful and enchanting, with layered textures, rich greens and teals, and a sense of lively, secret woodland commerce.

items.name: The Candle Dragon
items.prompt: A tiny dragon curled protectively around a melting beeswax candle on an old wooden table, rendered in detailed, painterly realism. Its translucent wings catch the flame's golden glow, revealing delicate veins and subtle color shifts. Rivulets of wax cascade down the candle like miniature waterfalls, pooling around the dragon's claws and reflecting the flickering light. Soot, matchsticks, and scattered wax drips create tactile clutter on the tabletop, while the background falls into warm, moody darkness. The scene balances cozy intimacy with magical grandeur, emphasizing fine texture in scales, wax, and wood grain.

items.name: Profile Picture Studio
items.prompt: A professional studio portrait faithfully rendering the person from the reference image for use as a polished profile picture. Soft window-box and fill lighting create flattering shadows and gentle catchlights in the eyes, preserving natural skin texture while smoothing harsh imperfections. A neutral backdrop with a subtle vertical gradient provides clean separation without distraction. Painterly editorial-style color grading enhances warmth and clarity, while balanced sharpness and shallow depth of field keep focus on the face. Overall, the image feels like a premium, modern studio headshot optimized for faceswap and social profiles.

items.name: Product on White
items.prompt: A studio-grade product rendering of the referenced object isolated on seamless pure white, with no visible horizon line. Softbox lighting from multiple angles produces gentle, realistic reflections and a clean, controlled specular sheen on materials while avoiding harsh hotspots. A subtle, natural contact shadow anchors the object to an invisible surface and reinforces scale. High-resolution painterly detail captures fine textures, edges, and branding elements. The final result is a crisp, ecommerce-ready cutout suitable for catalogs, online stores, and product listings.

items.name: Room Makeover Preview
items.prompt: An interior design visualization transforming the reference room into a modern minimalist retreat while preserving its architecture, perspective, and main layout. Replace existing surfaces with warm wood floors, soft neutral textiles, and matte, desaturated wall tones. Introduce sculptural lighting fixtures that cast gentle pools of light and subtle shadows. Style the space with a few carefully chosen decor pieces—plants, art prints, and tactile objects—to keep the scene airy and uncluttered. Painterly photorealism, accurate perspective, and soft, diffuse daylight streaming through the windows complete the calm, aspirational makeover preview.

items.name: Outfit Color Changer
items.prompt: Recolor the outfit from the reference image to any chosen hue or color palette while preserving all garment details: fabric texture, folds, stitching, and original shading. Maintain consistent lighting direction and intensity so the new color feels naturally integrated. Edges of the clothing are cleanly masked against skin and background, avoiding halos or color bleeding. Painterly refinement and subtle tonal variation across the fabric keep the result realistic, as if the garment were originally designed in the new color.

items.name: Poster Mockup Generator
items.prompt: A realistic poster mockup showcasing the reference artwork displayed on a gallery or studio wall. The poster is printed on slightly textured paper with fine grain and gentle curl at the corners, held by clips, tape, or in a minimal frame. Warm track lighting above casts soft, angled shadows and subtle specular highlights across the print surface. Surrounding props—such as a stool, plant, or stack of books—are understated and slightly out of focus to keep attention on the artwork. Painterly realism, accurate perspective, and nuanced lighting make the mockup feel like a high-end photography shot for a design portfolio.

items.name: Midnight Glow Portrait
items.prompt: An ultra-detailed New Year's Eve portrait of the person from the reference image, standing beneath a sky densely packed with bursting fireworks, depicted with a joyful, celebratory expression that reflects genuine New Year excitement. Their facial structure is outlined by champagne-gold rim light and cool cobalt reflections, rendered with crisp hyperreal skin texture and natural contours. Soft drifting bokeh, atmospheric haze, and faint smoke trails create a painterly festive glow around the subject. Firework colors—coral, magenta, and molten gold—dance in the eyes and along the edges of hair and clothing. Cinematic framing, dynamic contrast, and precise faceswap-optimized detail give the image the energy of a premium holiday campaign visual filled with happiness and celebration.

items.name: Champagne Studio Shot
items.prompt: A refined studio portrait featuring the person from the reference image surrounded by a soft veil of champagne mist and sparkling droplets, preserving their likeness with clean, editorial realism. Golden spark trails swirl in controlled arcs around them, frozen mid-air like light-painting strokes. High-end fashion lighting defines cheekbones and contours with smooth gradients and polished highlights, while a soft, unfussy backdrop keeps the focus on the subject. Coral-and-gold painterly accents and subtle lens bloom add a luxurious New Year mood. The overall look is elegant, celebratory, and optimized for sharp, flattering faceswap results.

items.name: Firecracker Runway
items.prompt: An avant-garde New Year runway tableau featuring the person from the reference image striding confidently through a corridor of suspended slow-motion firecrackers, preserving their facial detail with cinematic clarity. Glowing embers and ember dust hang frozen in the air, casting warm orange and cool cobalt spark halos around a reflective, high-fashion outfit. The runway floor mirrors bursts of light and silhouetted onlookers, while subtle smoke ribbons and distant spotlights fade into a hazy background. Painterly motion blur, dynamic composition, and bold fashion-forward styling create a surreal, editorial campaign image.

items.name: Year of Your Life Poster
items.prompt: A cinematic New Year motivational poster featuring the person from the reference image in a bold, forward-driving pose, as if stepping into the new year. A strong top-down spotlight shapes the face and shoulders with crisp definition, while soft fill light preserves natural skin detail. Behind them, large abstract painterly numerals of the coming year 2026 glow and overlap with swirling confetti, light streaks, and subtle particle effects. A deep cobalt-to-gold gradient atmosphere suggests ambition, renewal, and momentum. Clean, hyperreal facial rendering optimized for faceswap, with a confident, poster-style composition suitable for inspirational key art.

items.name: Portrait Upgrade
items.prompt: A professional studio headshot upgrade of the person from the reference image, designed for resumes, LinkedIn, and high-stakes professional use. Precise, clean lighting creates even illumination with gentle shadow roll-off, preserving micro-detailed skin texture while subtly smoothing distractions. A soft neutral gradient backdrop offers modern minimalism and strong subject separation. Editorial-style color grading introduces subtle warmth and clarity, while balanced sharpness and shallow depth of field keep attention squarely on the eyes and expression. The overall result is a hyperreal, trustworthy, and contemporary portrait optimized for faceswap.

items.name: Document Scanner Clean-Up
items.prompt: A high-fidelity digital reconstruction of the reference document, rendered as a perfectly clean, professional flat scan. Remove all shadows, gradients, creases, camera distortion, lens warping, and uneven illumination. Rebuild text with crisp, artifact-free edges and enhanced micro-contrast for maximum legibility. Correct geometry for a true top-down orthographic appearance, apply neutral white balance, and produce a flawless, print-ready digital document with polished clarity.

items.name: Background Remove Pro
items.prompt: Isolate the subject from the reference image using ultra-precise edge detection and pixel-level masking. Preserve fine hair strands, soft edge translucency, natural fringing, and accurate light spill. Produce a perfectly clean transparent background with zero halos, artifacts, or color bleed. Maintain natural shadow definition and correct global contrast for seamless placement into any design environment.

items.name: Room Style Switch
items.prompt: Transform the reference room into a fully reimagined interior style chosen by the user—modern, rustic, Scandinavian, industrial, or luxury—while retaining original architecture and perspective. Replace materials with high-resolution photoreal surfaces, introduce new lighting moods, and restyle the furniture layout with coherent décor choices. Maintain accurate depth, clean geometry, and painterly realism for a convincingly redesigned living space.

items.name: Product Lifestyle Scene
items.prompt: Place the referenced product into a premium lifestyle environment that matches its intended use. Maintain true scale, correct perspective, and accurate material interaction with its surroundings. Add soft directional lighting, natural reflections, and subtle occlusion shadows for realistic integration. Use painterly depth of field to control focus, supported by cohesive color grading for a polished, marketing-ready product showcase.

items.name: Monochrome Noir
items.prompt: Convert the reference image into a dramatic monochrome noir portrait with deep velvety shadows, sharp highlights, rich midtone separation, and elegant analog-inspired film grain. Add subtle vignette, refined contrast shaping, and painterly black-and-white tonality reminiscent of classic darkroom photography.

items.name: Vintage Film Fade
items.prompt: Apply a vintage film-print aesthetic to the reference image: warm sepia undertones, gentle highlight bloom, soft halation, mild color fading, and authentic analog grain. Introduce painterly retro texture and 1970s photo-album warmth while preserving clarity and facial definition.

items.name: Cyber Neon Glow
items.prompt: Enhance the reference image with a bold cyberpunk neon aesthetic: magenta and teal rim lights, luminous edge bloom, chrome reflections, deep futuristic gradients, and subtle holographic glow. Add painterly sci-fi atmosphere for a striking, modern cyber-neon transformation.

items.name: Soft Pastel Dream
items.prompt: Convert the reference image into a soft pastel editorial look featuring airy highlights, creamy low-contrast tones, desaturated warm hues, gentle haze, and smooth painterly gradients. The result feels dreamy, elegant, and magazine-ready.

items.name: Cinematic Teal & Orange
items.prompt: Apply cinematic teal-and-orange color grading to the reference image, balancing cool deep shadows with warm, luminous highlights. Add refined film grain, painterly contrast, and subtle atmospheric depth to create a true blockbuster-style visual.

items.name: High-Key Glow
items.prompt: Transform the reference image into a bright high-key portrait with lifted shadows, soft luminous whites, airy micro-contrast, pastel hues, and a gentle glowing haze. Maintain natural facial detail while creating an elegant, radiant aesthetic.

items.name: Matte Minimalist
items.prompt: Apply a minimalist matte color profile to the reference image: reduced contrast, softened highlights, deepened blacks, and fine painterly micro-texture. The result is clean, modern, understated, and ideal for contemporary visual design.

items.name: Polaroid Instant Look
items.prompt: Transform the reference image into an authentic Polaroid-style instant print. Add a true Polaroid white frame with subtle wear, washed-out color palette, low-contrast warm shadows, soft vignette, fine analog grain, painterly retro texture, and faint chemical bloom for genuine instant-film nostalgia.

items.name: HDR Boost
items.prompt: Enhance the reference image with a crisp HDR-inspired filter: boosted local contrast, vivid micro-detail, expanded dynamic range, and bright, clarity-rich rendering. Maintain natural tonality while achieving a clean, high-impact visual.

items.name: Warm Golden Hour
items.prompt: Wash the reference image in golden-hour warmth: soft diffused orange sunlight, glowing rim highlights, long painterly shadows, and natural atmospheric haze. Create a cinematic sunset aesthetic with rich warmth and inviting depth.

items.name: Kodak Film Classic
items.prompt: Apply a Kodak-inspired analog film aesthetic to the reference image featuring warm golden undertones, soft highlight halation, natural contrast roll-off, gentle analog grain, and painterly color response reminiscent of Kodak Portra and classic negative film stocks.

items.name: Fuji Supercolor
items.prompt: Enhance the reference image with a Fuji-inspired supercolor profile featuring vibrant, high-saturation hues, crisp microcontrast, clean cool shadows, and signature soft green-cyan tonality. Add fine analog grain, smooth painterly gradients, and rich color separation evocative of Fuji Pro and Velvia professional film stocks.

items.name: Ilford Black & White Plus
items.prompt: Convert the reference image into a premium Ilford-style monochrome photograph with deep velvety blacks, luminous clean highlights, rich midtone structure, and subtle analog grain. Apply painterly tonal transitions and fine-film elegance for a refined black-and-white finish.

items.name: Retro Christmas Chores
items.prompt: Place the reference person inside a 1960s-1970s retro Christmas kitchen, preserving their likeness while styling them in period-accurate holiday clothing. Warm incandescent lighting reflects off chrome appliances and patterned linoleum floors, surrounded by plaid curtains, tinsel garlands, and mid-century festive décor. Capture charming seasonal chores—mixing cookie dough, basting a turkey, wrapping gifts—with soft film texture, nostalgic mid-century color palettes, and painterly vintage warmth.

items.name: Noel Costume Shenanigans
items.prompt: Transform the reference face into a playful holiday character wearing an oversized elf suit, tangled light-string outfit, malfunctioning toy-soldier uniform, or other comedic Noël costume—while preserving facial accuracy. Place them in energetic slapstick scenes such as slipping on wrapping paper, being chased by a mischievous reindeer, or getting stuck in a giant gift box. Use painterly festive lighting, coral-and-gold highlights, and lively motion for maximum personality.

items.name: Santa's Lap
items.prompt: Depict the reference person sitting on Santa’s lap in a nostalgic mall-photo setting, preserving facial identity, expression, and outfit. Change their outfit to a classic Christmas sweater with cozy knit texture and festive patterns. Surround them with warm glowing Christmas lights, oversized candy canes, cotton-snow props, and a vintage portrait-booth backdrop. Apply soft focus, gentle bokeh, and painterly holiday warmth to balance humor with classic Christmas charm.

items.name: Christmas Runway Angel
items.prompt: Reimagine the reference person as a glamorous Christmas runway model walking a glittering holiday catwalk, preserving facial identity and body proportions. Style them in luxurious red-and-gold couture with feathered wings, crystal embellishments, and sculpted silhouettes. Add dramatic spotlights, reflective stage flooring, drifting confetti, and painterly high-fashion energy for a premium festive campaign visual.

items.name: Christmas Polaroid Memory
items.prompt: Transform the reference photo into a cozy Christmas Polaroid: warm incandescent glow, soft vintage tonality, gentle film grain, and a subtle painterly color shift. Dress the reference person in festive Christmas-themed clothing—such as a patterned holiday sweater, knitted winter scarf, or other warm seasonal attire—while preserving their facial likeness and natural proportions. Add holiday touches like blurred tree lights, garlands, stockings, or candles, while keeping the original composition intact. Include a handwritten date and authentic Polaroid texture to evoke a cherished instant-film holiday memory.

items.name: Ultra Glow Magazine Cover
items.prompt: Create a hyperreal magazine cover featuring the reference person as a global icon, with neon coral-and-cobalt lighting, glossy skin glow, dynamic rim lights, and bold typographic overlays. Add soft painterly gradients, subtle glare, and high-energy visual flair crafted for viral social-media aesthetics.

items.name: You: Baby Edition
items.prompt: Transform the reference face into an ultra-cute toddler version while preserving identifiable likeness. Add rounded proportions, soft glossy skin, oversized hoodie, tiny accessories, pastel background, and gentle painterly tonality. The final look should be irresistibly adorable and engineered for viral reactions.

items.name: Older You
items.prompt: Generate a hyperreal age-progressed portrait of the reference person, preserving bone structure and defining facial markers while adding natural aging details: refined wrinkles, softened jawline, silvered hair, and mature skin texture. Apply warm painterly lighting with coral-and-gold undertones to convey dignity, emotional depth, and a believable future self.

items.name: Snowy Winter Photoshoot
items.prompt: place the reference person in a high-end outdoor winter photoshoot scene, preserving their facial identity while dressing them in fashionable modern winterwear — such as a tailored wool coat, faux-fur collar, knitted scarf, sleek boots, and soft cashmere gloves; capture them in a confident editorial pose like gazing over the shoulder or walking through falling snow; surround them with a serene snowy forest, soft overcast lighting, glistening snowflakes, painterly cool-toned highlights, and shallow depth of field; final image must look Instagram-ready with luxurious winter aesthetics and pristine visual clarity

items.name: Cozy Santa Portrait
items.prompt: depict the reference person as a modern Santa in a warm, intimate Christmas living room; maintain facial structure while dressing them in a premium deep-red velvet Santa coat with white fur trim and brushed-gold details; pose them seated comfortably in a soft armchair next to a glowing fireplace, holding a wrapped gift or sipping hot cocoa; decorate the room with garlands, hanging stockings, twinkling lights, and warm lantern glows; use painterly lighting with coral and gold warmth, cinematic bokeh, and crisp festive details for an Instagram-shareworthy holiday portrait

items.name: Christmas Morning Unwrapping
items.prompt: show the reference person in front of a beautifully decorated Christmas tree, opening presents in a cozy living room setting; preserve their facial identity, keep their likeness accurate while styling them in comfortable holiday clothing such as a knitted sweater, plaid pajama pants, or soft loungewear; pose them kneeling or sitting beside colorful gift boxes, warm fairy lights casting soft glows across the scene; add pine garlands, ornaments, candles, and subtle morning light through a frosted window; painterly warm tones, gentle depth of field, and Instagram-ready festive atmosphere
